price: 75. Tetapi barang siapa datang kepada-Nya dalam keadaan beriman, dan telah mengerjakan kebajikan, maka mereka itulah orang yang memperoleh derajat yang tinggi (mulia),
arabic: وَمَن يَأۡتِهِۦ مُؤۡمِنٗا قَدۡ عَمِلَ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ لَهُمُ ٱلدَّرَجَٰتُ ٱلۡعُلَىٰ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: waman yatihi mu'minan qad ʿamila al-ṣāliḥāti fa-ulāika lahumu al-darajātu al-ʿulā
